official_title: Enhanced Nutritional Optimization in LVAD (ENOL) Trial
inclusion_criteria:
* age >18 years
* hospitalized
* undergoing LVAD therapy (enrolled at time of acceptance)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* intubated
* congenital heart disease
* infiltrative cardiomyopathy
* unable to tolerate oral nutrition
* surgery expected in <5 days
